EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Used to warn the Customer of pending Closure
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW Customer Close Warning
EmailTemplate.subject: Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} FINAL NOTICE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your enquiry requires your attention.
We recently contacted you regarding your enquiry and need some additional information in order to proceed.
Previous Comment: {!Case.Last_Case_Comment}
Please respond as soon as possible to ensure that we can assist with your enquiry. If we do not receive a response from you within three business days we believe your enquiry may have been resolved and will close this case.
Thank you,
Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
